abstract: West Indian Kraigg Brathwaite makes cricket history against South Africa as first batsman in test history to open with seven.
lead_paragraph: Kraigg Brathwaite of the West Indies earned a footnote in cricket history when he opened with a seven in the third test against South Africa at Newlands in Cape Town.
snippet: Kraigg Brathwaite of the West Indies earned a footnote in cricket history when he opened with a seven in the third test against South Africa at Newlands in Cape Town.

headline.main: Rare Feat for a West Indies Cricket Player
